category.name: TIMEX
category.description: For any ardent sportsperson or adventure seeker, apart from the thrill and the ultimate destination, one of the most important aspects is sporting the right gear and equipment for the occasion. Topping the list of specialised equipment for your sports and adventure needs is this immaculately designed Timex Expedition Altimeter Analog Watch from their fab. Being a unisex watch, this multi-functional analog watch sports all the right functional and aesthetic elements to suit both, men and women. With a high level of accuracy, reliability and durability, this spectacular analog timepiece from Timex is sure to get you through all your sports, adventure or casuals events activities while always keeping track of time.

category.name: Harley- Davidson
DELL
category.description: Dell is an American multinational computer technology corporation named after its founder Michael Dell. They are the third largest personal computer vendor in the world, behind Lenovo and HP. Dell offers services such as developing, selling, repairing and providing related products to its vast consumer base. Most companies use Dell computers in their office due to the fast and reliable services they provide, especially when you have a system issue. Dell specializes in computer hardware, computer software, IT consulting and IT related services. Alienware and Perot Systems were taken over by Dell to give a boost to its already vast portfolio of products and services. Alienware computers are systems that are specially designed for gamers who prefer high-end graphics and a comfortable layout to game in. Innovative cooling systems inside the computer cabinet ensure peak performance even when playing new games at the highest resolution and graphics setting. Dell product lineup includes laptops, ultrabooks, desktops, all-in-one computers, electronic accessories, printers, workstations, tablets, servers, storage devices, networking devices and smartphones. Dell's success lies in the fact that they provide excellent customer service and take very little time to resolve issues with their systems.

category.name: American Tourister
Lenevo
category.description: Canon is a Japanese imaging and optics manufacturing company. They specialize in Cameras, Steppers Printers and of course, high quality precision oriented Camcorders. They have their headquarters located in Tokyo, Japan. This electronics giant is well known around the world for their Canon IXUS range of digital cameras. These early point and shoot cameras were very simple to use and greatly promoted casual photography. Their current crowd favorite is the PowerShot series of point and shoot cameras. The advantages of having a simple digital camera over an SLR camera is that they are faster to shoot with, easier to carry around and less intimidating than a professional grade camera. These cameras also can be powered with rechargeable batteries and battery packs. Choosing the right Canon camera is quite easy as long as you know what kind of photography you want to try out. For casual photographers, the simple point and shoot is more than enough. For professional photographers, an SLR or at least the advanced point and shoot camera is a must. SLR cameras have a lot of features packed into it, otherwise unavailable on a simple digi-cam. Mirrorless Cameras are also advanced cameras with better image sensors and a lack of a reflecting medium. You can choose the right kind of Canon Camera to buy on Flipkart's online shopping web portal by simply logging onto the site and browsing though the extensive collection. You can go through the products with the help of search filters provided to easily narrow down your search. Once this has been done, you can commence your final stages of choice by comparing a few cameras and going through the specifications and product descriptions. This is a vital step as it will help you decide on the final product. Once you have finally picked out your favorite Canon Camera, you can proceed to the order page to place a home delivery order. This takes place once the order has been confirmed. Confirmation of an order takes place after you have provided all the necessary details for a successful home delivery. You will need t provide a destination address as well as a contact number. Once the process has been completed and the order has been confirmed, it will not take more than a few days for you to get your Canon Camera delivered to your doorstep. You can opt for Credit Card, Debit Card or Net Banking payment options as well as Cash on Delivery.

category.description: Cameras are the best devices to capture a memorable moment. Today, with a wide range of digital cameras, SLRs and point and shoot cameras available in the market, one can easily get high-resolution pictures with world class image quality. While professional photographers are spoilt for choice with a range of high quality SLRs offered by Canon, Nikon, Sony or Olympus, amateurs can select for an equally good range of light weight digital cameras from Fujifilm, Sony, Samsung, Panasonic and more.These cameras offer photographers some great advantages with features like good shutter speed, auto focus, 10 - 16 megapixels and self-timers.

category.name: Sony
category.description: The Sony Corporation was founded in the year 1946 in the city of Tokyo. From starting out as a simple electronics store, the Company has grown tremendously since, to become one of the world leaders in not just basic electronics, but also Gaming, Entertainment, Media and Financial Services. The Company has been manufacturing electronics for professionals as well as the average consumer. Sony Corporation comes under the larger Sony Group, which is the parent company for various other subsidiaries. The company is well known for their high quality phones and cameras and also for their home theatre and other entertainment devices. They have also been releasing high quality mobile phones under the banner of Sony Ericsson. Now however, they have rebranded themselves, and release phones under the Sony brand alone. Apart from some memorable phones like the Walkman Series or the Xperia Series of phones, they have released some very good cameras as well. The Sony Alpha cameras are part of the SLR range of cameras. These are quite different from the Cybershot cameras as the Cybershots come under digital cameras with full auto-settings. The SLR Alpha cameras however are professional grade cameras with manual settings. These cameras can be manually tweaked to give you high quality images as long as you have the skills to operate an SLR camera to its full potential. You can easily buy Sony Cameras online through Flipkart's shopping website. This is easily achieved by logging onto the website and going through all the Cameras on offer. You can pick out a few of them and choose the right one based on the specifications of each device. There is also an option t choose and compare a few products. This will be helpful in situations where you need to check the finer details and differences between each device. Once you have been able to come to a decision about the kind of camera you wish to buy from Flipkart, you can proceed to the order placement page and get the order confirmed. After this comes the payment option which can be done through Credit Card, Debit Card or even by Net Banking. Apart from these payment options you can also go in for Cash or Card on delivery. This way, you can make the payment once you receive the shipment. If you have a change of mind, you can also go in for a replacement product or even a refund.

category.name: Knife Gate Valves
category.description: Knife gate valve is one of the most preferred industrial valves. It is featured with minimum contact between moving parts of the valves. In this type of valve, a gate is practically held between layers of gland packing without touching the body parts during most of its travels.

category.name: Check Valves
category.description:
Wafer Type Check Valves are an ideal choice to be mounted in between flanges. These valves are highly admired for the light weight design and hassle free installation between bolts of connecting flanges. 

We provide best quality Wafer Check Valves having short face to face dimensions. These are specifically designed and developed by our expert professionals in order to protect gas and liquid piping systems. Clients can avail best quality check valves in wafer versions.

category.name: Gate Valve
category.description: The Gate Valve is also known as a sluice valve. This type of valve opens by lifting a round or rectangular gate out of the path of the fluid. The sealing surfaces between the gate and seats are planar. This makes them an ideal choice when a straight-line flow of fluid and minimum restriction is desired.

category.name: Globe Valve
category.description:
Globe Valve is a type of valve consisting of a movable disk-type element and a stationary ring seat in a spherical body. This valve is generally used for regulating flow in a pipeline. Due to its salient features, globe valve is used for applications requiring throttling and frequent operation. 

We manufacture best quality globe valves in compliance with the international standards of quality. Following are the technical specifications for the globe valves offered by us.

category.name: Canon
category.description: Canon is a Japanese imaging and optics manufacturing company. They specialize in Cameras, Steppers Printers and of course, high quality precision oriented Camcorders. They have their headquarters located in Tokyo, Japan. This electronics giant is well known around the world for their Canon IXUS range of digital cameras. These early point and shoot cameras were very simple to use and greatly promoted casual photography. Their current crowd favorite is the PowerShot series of point and shoot cameras. The advantages of having a simple digital camera over an SLR camera is that they are faster to shoot with, easier to carry around and less intimidating than a professional grade camera. These cameras also can be powered with rechargeable batteries and battery packs. Choosing the right Canon camera is quite easy as long as you know what kind of photography you want to try out. For casual photographers, the simple point and shoot is more than enough. For professional photographers, an SLR or at least the advanced point and shoot camera is a must. SLR cameras have a lot of features packed into it, otherwise unavailable on a simple digi-cam. Mirrorless Cameras are also advanced cameras with better image sensors and a lack of a reflecting medium. You can choose the right kind of Canon Camera to buy on Flipkart's online shopping web portal by simply logging onto the site and browsing though the extensive collection. You can go through the products with the help of search filters provided to easily narrow down your search. Once this has been done, you can commence your final stages of choice by comparing a few cameras and going through the specifications and product descriptions. This is a vital step as it will help you decide on the final product. Once you have finally picked out your favorite Canon Camera, you can proceed to the order page to place a home delivery order. This takes place once the order has been confirmed. Confirmation of an order takes place after you have provided all the necessary details for a successful home delivery. You will need t provide a destination address as well as a contact number. Once the process has been completed and the order has been confirmed, it will not take more than a few days for you to get your Canon Camera delivered to your doorstep. You can opt for Credit Card, Debit Card or Net Banking payment options as well as Cash on Delivery.

category.name: Nicon
category.description: Nikon is a Japanese Optics and Imaging Company based in Tokyo Japan. Their foremost field of expertise is in lens technology, cameras and other optical instruments like microscopes, binoculars and optical measurement instruments. Nikon Cameras are a staple when it comes to photography. Their workmanship and quality of build make them the obvious choice for photographers everywhere. Beginners and professionals use Nikon Cameras due to the high image quality and other extra features found commonly in a Nikon. For the Casual photographer, the Coolpix series of cameras have been developed with a lot of features installed to ensure quality pictures across a variety of environments. These cameras are auto focus devices that take care of all the basic processes of photography. Also known as Point and Shoot (Point & Shoot) cameras, they have a lot of manual controls disabled to ensure all photos are digitally well composed thanks to the inbuilt sensors. You can also go in for the SLR cameras or the Advanced Point and Shoot cameras if you are new yet willing to learn the finer aspects of photography. All these types of Nikon Cameras can be bought on Flipkart's online shopping website by simply logging onto it and browsing through the extensive catalog of products. There is also the option for you to compare a few cameras together in order to come to a conclusion on which one to settle for. Once you have made your choice on which Nikon you want, you can go through its specifications to know everything there is to know about it. If that is not enough, you even have a brief description on the product to help you make your mind. Once this information has been absorbed, you can make an informed decision about your favorite Nikon Camera. After selecting the product, you need to place the order for it to be delivered to your home, or any other destination that you choose. For this, enter your address, phone number and contact email address. All this helps in the delivery process. After this has been done, and the order gets confirmed, you will receive the delivery within just a matter of a few days. There are various options of payment available to you. Credit Card, Debit Card and Net Banking are some of the more popular methods; though Cash on Delivery is equally popular in areas where online transfers are not possible.
